Title: We are determined to liberate Taiwan!
Designer: Red Eagle Corps of the Air force, Nanjing (南京部队空军红鹰)
Publisher: Shanghaishi Chuban Gemingzu (上海市出版革命组)
Notes: This poster, with subtitles in English, French and German, was very popular in the West. It decorated many students' rooms, together with the portrait of Che Guevara.The original version for the Chinese market is here.
